overview:
We are a team of technology domain experts who understand the line dividing distribution and solution delivery is growing thinner by the day. Merely providing a horizontal selling approach or being price competitive across product lines is not enough in the present economic scenario.

Increasingly Governments, System Integrators & Corporateâ€™s are looking for neutrality and this is the time distribution companies have to rise to meet & surpass their expectations.

CELECT operates through its field teams across 12 locations in 7 countries in the Americas, Europe and Asia Pacific. CELECTâ€™s Field Teams worldwide are recruited from diverse backgrounds giving us reach and expertise also in vertical specific domains. Our strength is their knowledge, enthusiasm and experience.

We are one of the few electronic distribution companies to provide 24-hour product marketing capability and expertise to our worldwide customer base.

More than Just Orders…

CELECT continuously endeavours to provide not only fast and efficient order processing and tracking but also try to actively assist the customers in choosing the best products for their solution requirements.

Having expertise in niche technologies CELECT is uniquely positioned to emerge as a single most preffered global distributor of electronic components supporting customers of all sizes worldwide.

We are continuously introducing new innovative programs, leading edge technology, superior service and a design-in focus through our Engineering Convergence Programmes. Specialties

Distribution, Reselling Hardware, Value Added Reseller, RFID, Tags, Smart Cards, AIDC, Library Automations, Web Convergence Technologies
